package:
pose_diff_calc 0.0.1
In this package, we calculate the position difference between two gps, and the angle difference between two yaw. 1.global_parameter.h contains global parameters. 2.map_frame.h is used to transform latitude/longitude information into 2D coordinate system. 3.position_diff.h/cpp calculates position difference. 4.angle_diff.h/cpp calculates angle difference. Welcome to use the pose_diff_calc module. For more information, feel free to contact the maintainer or author.
lty Cyberc3 (SJTU)
